title: Tracee Ellis Ross poses next to Snoop Dogg at Gabrielle Union's Halloween party
text:
Halloween is just days away, but the celebrity costumes just keep on coming.

Over the weekend, Tracee Ellis Ross, 47, showed up to a party dressed up as DJ Quick as she posed next to Snoop Dogg, 48.

Her friend Gabrielle Union-Wade, 47, snapped the photo at the party as she came in a flashback costume of a Clover cheerleading uniform, an ode to her Bring It On movie character.

DJ Quick: Over the weekend, Tracee Ellis Ross showed up to Gabrielle Union's party dressed up as DJ Quick as she posed next to Snoop Dogg

The Black-ish star posed in a black and red hat and a black bomber jacket with black and red stripes around the collar and the sleeves of the jacket.

Underneath, she wore a simple black t-shirt and black pants.

'If @traceeellisross didnt channel @djquik ?!?! Listeeeennnnn... & the fam @snoopdogg blessed the gathering #CaliforniaLove.' Gabrielle said on her Instagram next to the photo.

In character: The Black-ish star posed in a black and red hat and a black bomber jacket with black and red stripes around the collar and the sleeves of the jacket

Group photo: Gabrielle Union is pictured above with Jenni Mai, Jeezy, her husband Dwayne Wade, Quavo, and Saweetie

Also at the party was Gabrielle's daughter Kaavia James Union Wade whom she shares with her husband Dwyane Wade.

The little one looked like the spitting image of her parents as she rocked a matching costume with her famous mother.

Jeannie Mai and Jeezy also made an appearance as they posed with some of the Clover cheerleaders for a group photo.

California love: Tracee posed with another friend as she attended the #CaliforniaLove party

Both Tracee and Gabrielle are celebrating their 47th birthday today.

'I LOVE getting older and I LOVE my life,' she said in an Instagram post.

'Im so grateful to be living this life Im in. Ive worked so hard to feel good in my skin and to build a life that truly matches me and Im in it and it feels good. I remain curious and teachable and so it will all keep getting better.'

Happy birthday: Gabrielle shared this photo of herself in her Halloween costume as she rocks a two piece cheer costume at the age of 47
description: Halloween is just days away, but the celebrity costumes just keep on coming. Over the weekend, Tracee Ellis Ross, 47, showed up to a party dressed up as DJ Quick.
